data.name: Hex Picross
data.detailed_description:
A Hex Grid Logic Picross Game

Beautiful minimalist design and a relaxing atmosphere


Hex Picross was assembled with a beautiful and relaxing minimalist design
Made with relaxing visual and sound effects
In addition to music prepared exclusively

How to play


You need to click on the hexagonal cells to make them colored
Each diagonal and column counts how many colored cells there are
Your challenge is to find all the intersections between columns and diagonals
With this, they will decrease their number and will be equal to zero.
When all are equal to zero, you've won the game.

9x4 - 50 Levels
15x6 - 50 Levels
17x8 - 50 Levels
33x16 - 50 Levels

Resources
  • Minimalist: no timer and no pressure, solve puzzles in your own time
  • Premium: 200 carefully chosen levels
  • Zen: Zen and relaxing sound environment
  • Dark Mode: Perfect if you can't stare at the white screen for too long
  • Steam Cloud and Steam Achievements
